history.content:
You mentioned: "Whatis everyone’s Spanish level?"

Thanks for sharing. At Spanish Conversation Meetup: Beginner-Friendly Practice, many attendees start with similar feelings.

RSVPs: 15
Beginners (incl. upper-beginner): 10 (67%)
Intermediate: 3 (20%)
Advanced: 2 (13%)
We organize small groups and buddy intros so beginners feel comfortable.

We group by comfort level and offer buddy intros so beginners feel comfortable.

Would you like an intro to Lucía?
Will people judge me? I don’t know any Spanish.

You mentioned: "Will people judge me? I don’t know any Spanish."

Thanks for sharing. At Spanish Conversation Meetup: Beginner-Friendly Practice, many attendees start with similar feelings.

Members like Sara and Lucía felt similarly and found that small prompts and a welcoming mentor eased first conversations.

Would you like me to arrange a buddy intro for when you arrive?

Would you like an intro to Sara?
